EmailTemplate.subject: You could still have the BEST SUMMER EVER on NCS
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG
Frustrated with the weather?
Anxious about your exam results?
Stressed about how you’ll fill your long summer holiday?
Or proud of your achievements?
DATES/LOCATIONS ARE:
3 August – Staines
10 August – Woking
10 August – Guildford
15 August – Woking
15 August – Guildford
Have fun in the great outdoors
Learn new skills
Make new friends...
...and make a difference in your community
Call 07557 747551 to book now, places going fast! If you’re unable to get through, please leave your name and contact number for us to call you back.
Can’t make it this summer? Sign up for autumn now
